meanings.definition: A person who is extremely skilled or talented in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The young artist was a true samfus when it came to painting.

meanings.definition: To engage in a lively and enjoyable social gathering.

meanings.definition: A feeling of deep affection or intense attraction towards someone.
